attributes.action: Remove the right to vote for individuals who do not have a valid excuse to not contribute to society.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the exception of the old (provided they have contributed a certain amount in their life) the disabled, and other legitimate groups and within a pre-set defined fair protocol; Only grant the right to vote to those that contribute by way of taxes. This could serve as an incentive for workers and could address some of the inequalities between those that work hard and those that they support in society.
